Sql.query: select gps.gpscodi, gps.emprcodi, gps.equicodi, gps.nombre, gps.gpsoficial, DECODE(gps.gpsoficial,'S','SI', 'NO') AS oficial, gps.gpsosinerg, gps.gpsestado, DECODE(gps.gpsestado,'A','ACTIVO', 'BAJA') AS ESTADO, gps.gpstipo, gps.gpsgenalarma, DECODE(gps.gpsgenalarma,'S','SI', 'NO') AS GENALARMA, gps.gpsfeccreacion, gps.gpsusucreacion, gps.gpsfecmodifica, gps.gpsusumodifica, gps.rutafile from sic.me_gps gps WHERE gps.gpscodi=:GPSCODI
SELECT PERIDCCODI ,PERIDCNOMBRE FROM TRN_PERIODO_DECLARACION ORDER BY PERIDCCODI DESC

SELECT gps.gpscodi, gps.emprcodi, emp.emprnomb as empresa, gps.equicodi, gps.nombre, gps.gpsoficial, DECODE(gps.gpsoficial,'S','SI', 'NO') AS oficial, gps.gpsosinerg, gps.gpsestado, DECODE(gps.gpsestado,'A','ACTIVO', 'BAJA') AS ESTADO, gps.gpstipo, gps.gpsgenalarma, DECODE(gps.gpsgenalarma,'S','SI', 'NO') AS GENALARMA, gps.gpsfeccreacion, gps.gpsusucreacion, gps.gpsfecmodifica, gps.gpsusumodifica, gps_resp.nombre as respaldo, gps.rutafile from sic.me_gps gps left join SIC.VW_SI_EMPRESA emp on gps.emprcodi=emp.emprcodi left join sic.me_gps gps_resp on gps.equicodi=gps_resp.gpscodi WHERE gps.gpsestado not in ('E') ORDER BY gpscodi ASC

SELECT gps.gpscodi, gps.emprcodi, emp.emprnomb as empresa, gps.equicodi, gps.nombre, gps.gpsoficial, DECODE(gps.gpsoficial,'S','SI', 'NO') AS oficial, gps.gpsosinerg, gps.gpsestado, DECODE(gps.gpsestado,'A','ACTIVO', 'BAJA') AS ESTADO, gps.gpstipo, gps.gpsgenalarma, DECODE(gps.gpsgenalarma,'S','SI', 'NO') AS GENALARMA, gps.gpsfeccreacion, gps.gpsusucreacion, gps.gpsfecmodifica, gps.gpsusumodifica, gps_resp.nombre as respaldo, gps.rutafile from sic.me_gps gps left join SIC.VW_SI_EMPRESA emp on gps.emprcodi=emp.emprcodi left join sic.me_gps gps_resp on gps.equicodi=gps_resp.gpscodi WHERE gps.gpsestado not in ('E') AND gps.gpsestado='A' and ({0}=0 or gps.gpscodi={0}) and (nvl('{1}','X')='X' or gps.gpsoficial='{1}') ORDER BY gpscodi ASC
select max(gpscodi) + 1 as codigo from sic.me_gps where gpscodi not in (98, 99)
select count(*) as num_registros from sic.F_LECTURA where GPSCODI={0}
